name: keynote-archives
description: Contains Keynote Archive serializers and deserializers

scripts.generate-ts-from-proto: mkdir -p src/generated && npx protoc --ts_out src/generated --proto_path src/protocols/ src/protocols/*.proto
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run generate-ts-from-proto && npm run generate-index-from-ts && npm run build

author: Markus Rudolph
